Romulus Hillsborough, in his email to me, did not mention which
publishing company would be producing his Shinsengumi book.

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> Ok so I'm too lazy to check this by going through past messages but I 
> found out last night that the upcoming book by Romulus Hillsborough on 
> the Shinsengumi is being published by Tuttle Publishing not Ridgeback 
> Press as his other books were.
> 
>  I know the book was mentioned on list before and I thought Ridgeback 
> was mentioned in conjunction but I'm not sure so if you've seen this 
> publisher info before  we'll just it blame it on "the fish".
>
